feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 10:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -37.1°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -41.0°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
